hint1: set the chanceAsPercentage to a percent of end city chests containing shulker shells. default is 75, meaning 75% chance.
hint2: reminder: this only applies if simple mode is set to false in config AND difficulty is peaceful.
hint3: set the amountOfShellsInStack to number of items you wish to get at once.
